item.title: People Are Protesting Data Centers—but Embracing the Factories That Supply Them
item.description: As the data center backlash grows, support is growing for server factories and the hundreds of jobs they’re expected to bring.

item.title: Why Minnesota Can’t Do More to Stop ICE
item.description: Democratic lawmakers have few options that wouldn’t trigger something like civil war.

item.title: Phonak Audeo Infinio Ultra Sphere Review: Premium Hearing Aids
item.description: This new prescription hearing aid has a special chip designed to improve hearing in noisy conditions.
